description: Expose WordPress and WooCommerce REST API tools to enable seamless integration and interaction with WordPress sites. Facilitate automated content management and e-commerce operations through standardized tool calls. Enhance your applications by leveraging WordPress data and functionality programmatically.

tools.name: wp_get_posts
tools.description: Get WordPress posts with optional filtering parameters

per_page.description: Number of posts per page (default: 10, max: 100)

tools.name: wp_get_post
tools.description: Get a specific WordPress post by ID

force.description: Whether to bypass trash and force deletion

tools.name: wp_get_pages
tools.description: Get WordPress pages with optional filtering parameters

tools.name: wp_get_page
tools.description: Get a specific WordPress page by ID

force.description: Whether to bypass trash and force deletion

tools.name: wp_get_users
tools.description: Get WordPress users with optional filtering parameters

tools.name: wp_get_user
tools.description: Get a specific WordPress user by ID

reassign.description: User ID to reassign content to

tools.name: wp_get_category
tools.description: Get a specific WordPress category by ID

tools.name: wp_get_tag
tools.description: Get a specific WordPress tag by ID

tools.name: wp_get_comment
tools.description: Get a specific WordPress comment by ID

per_page.description: Number of media items per page

tools.name: wp_get_media_item
tools.description: Get a specific WordPress media item by ID

tools.name: wp_update_media_item
tools.description: Update an existing WordPress media item

tools.name: wp_upload_media
tools.description: Upload a file to WordPress media library

filename.description: Name of the file including extension

content_type.description: MIME type of the file (e.g., image/jpeg, image/png)

tools.name: wp_upload_media_from_url
tools.description: Download an image from URL and upload it to WordPress media library

url.description: URL of the image to download and upload

filename.description: Name of the file including extension (optional, will extract from URL if not provided)

tools.name: wp_get_menu
tools.description: Get a specific WordPress menu by ID

type.description: Content type to search (post, page, etc.)

tools.name: wc_get_products
tools.description: Get WooCommerce products with optional filtering parameters

tools.name: wc_get_product
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce product by ID

tools.name: wc_get_product_variations
tools.description: Get variations for a variable WooCommerce product

tools.name: wc_get_product_category
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce product category by ID

tools.name: wc_create_product_category
tools.description: Create a new WooCommerce product category

tools.name: wc_update_product_category
tools.description: Update an existing WooCommerce product category

tools.name: wc_get_product_tag
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce product tag by ID

tools.name: wc_create_product_tag
tools.description: Create a new WooCommerce product tag

tools.name: wc_update_product_tag
tools.description: Update an existing WooCommerce product tag

tools.name: wc_get_orders
tools.description: Get WooCommerce orders with optional filtering parameters

tools.name: wc_get_order
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce order by ID

tools.name: wc_get_order_notes
tools.description: Get notes for a WooCommerce order

customer_note.description: Whether note is visible to customer

tools.name: wc_get_customers
tools.description: Get WooCommerce customers with optional filtering parameters

tools.name: wc_get_customer
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce customer by ID

reassign.description: User ID to reassign content to

tools.name: wc_get_coupons
tools.description: Get WooCommerce coupons with optional filtering parameters

tools.name: wc_get_coupon
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce coupon by ID

tools.name: wc_get_product_review
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce product review by ID

tools.name: wc_create_product_review
tools.description: Create a new WooCommerce product review

tools.name: wc_update_product_review
tools.description: Update an existing WooCommerce product review

tools.name: wc_create_tax_class
tools.description: Create a new WooCommerce tax class

per_page.description: Number of tax rates per page

tools.name: wc_get_tax_rate
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce tax rate by ID

tools.name: wc_create_tax_rate
tools.description: Create a new WooCommerce tax rate

tools.name: wc_update_tax_rate
tools.description: Update an existing WooCommerce tax rate

tools.name: wc_get_shipping_zone
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce shipping zone by ID

tools.name: wc_create_shipping_zone
tools.description: Create a new WooCommerce shipping zone

tools.name: wc_update_shipping_zone
tools.description: Update an existing WooCommerce shipping zone

tools.name: wc_get_shipping_zone_methods
tools.description: Get shipping methods for a WooCommerce shipping zone

tools.name: wc_get_shipping_zone_method
tools.description: Get a specific shipping zone method

tools.name: wc_create_shipping_zone_method
tools.description: Create a new shipping zone method

tools.name: wc_get_payment_gateway
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce payment gateway by ID

tools.name: wc_run_system_status_tool
tools.description: Run a WooCommerce system status tool

tools.name: wc_get_setting_group
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce settings group

tools.name: wc_get_setting_option
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce setting option

options.description: Array of setting options to update

tools.name: wc_get_webhook
tools.description: Get a specific WooCommerce webhook by ID
